item.title: DNS sinkhole, between Privacy and AdBlocker, configuration and feedback
item.description: DNS sinkhole that protects your devices from unwanted content, without installing any client-side software. Presentation Filter your DNS queries DNS querie is used to convert a web address (duckduckgo.com) by an IP address usable by your computer (40.114.177.156) DNS-Sinkhole is placed between the DNS Server, and your client (Computer, TV, Tablet, Phone etc …) Depending on the configuration of your DNS-Sinkhole, it can accept the request, or refuse it, based on DNS-Sinkhole List.
